name: Wizroid
description:
Full Sail University Student Project.

Made in three months by students 10 months into their Game Development Bachelor's Degree.

The Team - 

Jordan Calderwood -  Camera, User Interface, Player Movement, Pixel Art

Aaron Holowienka - Save/Load System,  Debugging, Sound Manager, Final Boss AI

Chris Caruthers -  Enemy AI, Level Design, Particle Effects

Ellis Johnson - Enemy AI, Earth Boss AI, Sound Design/Implementation

Spencer Shaffer  - Level Design, Wind Boss AI

Controls:  Keyboard / PS4

Jump - Space / x

Move - AD / D-Pad/Analog

Enter Door/ Save - W / up

Fireball - J / Square

Angle45 Fireball - , / Left Trigger

Angle90 Fireball - . / Right Trigger

GroundPound - K / Circle

Water Teleport(MorphBall) - L / Triangle
